name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'What an Amazing Swing'. Watame dances and sings with back-up dancers on a vibrant, casino-themed stage.
MC section where Watame greets the audience, celebrates her 4th anniversary, and introduces her new outfit and stage setup.
Performance of 'Shake it!' featuring Watame and guests Shirakami Fubuki, Shiranui Flare, and Omaru Polka (Bakutare).

subtitles.original: 落とし穴作っちゃうんでしょ 最初にダンス
subtitles.english: You're probably making a pitfall, aren't you? Let's dance first

subtitles.original: What an amazing swing!
subtitles.english: What an amazing swing!

subtitles.original: 甘え上手に誘われて Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa
subtitles.english: Tempted by a skilled coquette, Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa

subtitles.original: 退屈なクラウドの日常から連れ出してあげましょう
subtitles.english: Let me take you away from your boring daily life in the cloud

subtitles.original: あからさま良い様テンション Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa
subtitles.english: An obviously high tension, Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa

subtitles.original: だだだって 煙立つ踊りまで Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Because, because... until a smoky dance, Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Go for broke!
subtitles.english: Go for broke!

subtitles.original: 埃着飾ら見てまま ごちゃごちゃフロア転ばらぬトマササイズ
subtitles.english: Decked out in dust, look as you are; the cluttered floor, no-fall Watama-cise

subtitles.original: 退廃的な大事実の劇だ 待機室も一流のフィクサーばかり
subtitles.english: A decadent great truth's play; the waiting room is full of top-notch fixers

subtitles.original: ギリギリ悪くない 尺八のような フワフワと跳ねるジャバ・ザ・ボラ
subtitles.english: Barely not bad, like a shakuhachi, the Fuwa Fuwa jumping Java the Bora

subtitles.original: 太陽へ出すトーストするくらい 騒げ元旦 元旦 元旦!
subtitles.english: To the point of toasting towards the sun, make some noise! New Year, New Year, New Year!

subtitles.original: 惑星を揺るがして
subtitles.english: Shake the planet

subtitles.original: 音色な渦巻いて
subtitles.english: Swirling with melodies

subtitles.original: ステージは崩壊で
subtitles.english: The stage is collapsing

subtitles.original: Yeah, swinging per-night
subtitles.english: Yeah, swinging per-night

subtitles.original: 浮かれな気持ちはマテロ Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa
subtitles.english: The festive feeling is Watamelo, Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa

subtitles.original: 目映いラウドな非日常 どらに入れましょう
subtitles.english: Dazzling, loud non-daily life; let's put it into the dorama

subtitles.original: 全てを退け出すテンション Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa
subtitles.english: A tension that drives everything away, Fuwa Fuwa Fuwa

subtitles.original: いっそサンクチュアリ 輝く Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: May as well be a sanctuary, shining Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: 待ってた今に輝く Do-do-do-do-down
subtitles.english: Shining in the moment we've been waiting for, Do-do-do-do-down

subtitles.original: こんばんドドドー！
subtitles.english: Konban-Dododo!

subtitles.original: ドドド！
subtitles.english: Dododo!

subtitles.original: いらっしゃいませー、ラムベガスへー！
subtitles.english: Welcome to Lamb Vegas!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ということで、角巻わため、4周年でございます！
subtitles.english: So, it's Tsunomaki Watame's 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: みんな、いつも本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much everyone, always!

subtitles.original: いやコメントもね、いっぱいありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: And thank you for all the comments too.

subtitles.original: 「おめでとう」「おめでとう」、ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: All the "Congratulations", thank you!

subtitles.original: いや、みんなのおかげで、本当にここまで楽しく活動できたと思います。
subtitles.english: I think I've been able to have fun activities until now, all thanks to you.

subtitles.original: そこでみんなにお願いがあるんですけど、いいですか？
subtitles.english: So, I have a request for everyone, is that okay?

subtitles.original: えー、こちら、あの、こちら、
subtitles.english: Well, this... um, this...

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグが今日ありまして、
subtitles.english: We have a hashtag for today,

subtitles.original: 「#角巻わため4周年」、4は半角でね、4周年。
subtitles.english: "#角巻わため4周年", using a half-width "4" for the 4th anniversary.

subtitles.original: ぜひいっぱいスクショとかを撮って、
subtitles.english: Please take lots of screenshots,

subtitles.original: たくさんポストとかしていただけたらなと思います！
subtitles.english: and I'd love for you to post them a lot!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm counting on you!

subtitles.original: えっちょっと見て、これ！
subtitles.english: Hey, look at this!

subtitles.original: ブーン、ブーン、ブーン、ブーン！
subtitles.english: Vroom, vroom, vroom, vroom!

subtitles.original: 怒られないかなぁ？
subtitles.english: I hope I don't get in trouble.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫かなぁ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: あんまり振り回すとね、危ないですからね、
subtitles.english: If I swing it too much, it's dangerous,

subtitles.original: みんなも、しなりに気をつけてください。
subtitles.english: so everyone, please be careful of the flex.

subtitles.original: いや見て、これ！
subtitles.english: Look at this!

subtitles.original: ステージ！作っていただきました！
subtitles.english: The stage! It was made for me!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: これはね、「What an amazing swing」のMVですね、
subtitles.english: This is from the "What an amazing swing" MV,

subtitles.original: ミュージックビデオを再現していただいて、
subtitles.english: it's a recreation of the music video.

subtitles.original: え、すごくない？月とかね、かなりリアルにMVを再現してくれてて、
subtitles.english: Isn't it amazing? The moon and everything look so real, just like the MV.

subtitles.original: どうですか？
subtitles.english: What do you think?

subtitles.original: ここで今から、いっぱい歌って踊って、
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing and dance a lot from now on,

subtitles.original: 楽しい楽しい宴をしていきたいと思ってますよ。
subtitles.english: and have a fun, fun party!

subtitles.original: 準備はいいですか？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: あそこのステッキもね、見て！
subtitles.english: And look at that cane (staff) too!

subtitles.original: これ！
subtitles.english: This!

subtitles.original: あの、わためいとの毛をむしって作らせていただきました。
subtitles.english: Um, I had it made by plucking the wool of Watamates.

subtitles.original: いや、みんな毛の提供ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone for providing the wool!

subtitles.original: こんなかっこいいステッキになりました、本当にありがとう、
subtitles.english: It's become such a cool cane. Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: いっぱい使いたいと思います、これからもね。
subtitles.english: I want to use it a lot from now on.

subtitles.original: いや、もうみんな待てないよね、
subtitles.english: I'm sure everyone can't wait anymore.

subtitles.original: 「MC長い」って思ってない、大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: You might think the "MC is too long," I hope it's okay.

subtitles.original: この後は、たくさんたくさん、ゲストの方と歌って踊ったりしていきますので、
subtitles.english: After this, I'll be singing and dancing with many guests!

subtitles.original: まだまだ盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's keep getting excited!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 寂しくて切ない一人の夜には
subtitles.english: On lonely and painful nights spent alone

subtitles.original: 消えたい言葉を探して
subtitles.english: Searching for words to make me disappear

subtitles.original: 秘密のドアを抜けてきて
subtitles.english: Come pass through the secret door

subtitles.original: 君が Oh yeah! (Oh yeah!) Oh yeah! (Oh yeah!) Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: And you, Oh yeah! (Oh yeah!) Oh yeah! (Oh yeah!) Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: Shake it! 作詞・作曲: emon
subtitles.english: Shake it! Lyrics & Composition: emon

subtitles.original: バクタレです！
subtitles.english: We're Bakutare!

subtitles.original: そしてー！
subtitles.english: And next...!

subtitles.original: わため4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Watame, congrats on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: アゲてこうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's turn it up!

subtitles.original: オウ！オウ！オウ！オウ！わため！レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Watame! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 目の前の扉を開ければそう
subtitles.english: If you open the door in front of you, yes

subtitles.original: 終わりのない夜への始まりだ
subtitles.english: It's the beginning of a never-ending night

subtitles.original: 急上昇のフロアーの影から
subtitles.english: From the shadows of the soaring floor

subtitles.original: 四次元への旅が始まるよ
subtitles.english: The journey into the fourth dimension begins

subtitles.original: 流星の運ぶ船に乗ってさ
subtitles.english: Riding on a ship carried by meteors

subtitles.original: 時空旅行へと...
subtitles.english: On to a time-space journey...
